verses.roman:
ānera ki kathā, tumi--prabhura upadeṣṭā!
āmi ta' bhikṣuka vipra, tumi--mora poṣṭā

synonyms: ānera ki kathā—what to speak of others; tumi—you; prabhura upadeṣṭā—an instructor of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āmi—I; ta'-certainly; bhikṣuka—beggar; vipra—brāhmaṇa; tumi—you; mora—my; poṣṭā—maintainer.
translation: "You are an instructor even for Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, not to speak of others. I am but a beggar brāhmaṇa, and you are my maintainer.
